responses.body:
{
  "recipes": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Spaghetti Carbonara",
      "author": "Chef Mario",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/deliciosa-pasta-plato_23-2150690609.jpg",
      "description": "A classic Italian dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.",
      "preparation_time": "20 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente.",
        "Fry the pancetta until crispy.",
        "Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.",
        "Combine pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.",
        "Serve with black pepper and extra cheese."
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Tacos al Pastor",
      "author": "Chef Juan",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/primer-plano-deliciosos-tacos_23-2150831025.jpg?t=st=1743607391~exp=1743610991~hmac=94df553f842f6490c49adff7b25da4d34043599723670b1fb78a44238aa8a688&w=996",
      "description": "Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, achiote, and spices.",
      "preparation_time": "35 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Marinate pork with achiote, pineapple juice, and spices.",
        "Grill the pork until golden brown.",
        "Warm the tortillas on a skillet.",
        "Slice the pork and serve in tortillas.",
        "Top with chopped onion, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime."
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "name": "Sushi Roll",
      "author": "Chef Sato",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/plato-primer-plano-sushi_23-2148631177.jpg?t=st=1743610728~exp=1743614328~hmac=5e14b8a580a9934a2921a5388330b78a0e2c97d9659f1c5513284d32faeec65b&w=740",
      "description": "Delicious Japanese sushi with rice, seaweed, and fresh fish.",
      "preparation_time": "45 minutes",
       "steps": [
        "Cook sushi rice and season with vinegar.",
        "Lay seaweed on a bamboo mat and spread rice evenly.",
        "Add fish and vegetables on top.",
        "Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.",
        "Cut into pieces and serve with soy sauce."
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Chicken Curry",
      "author": "Chef Priya",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/pollo-al-curry-rojo-taza-negra_1150-23928.jpg?t=st=1743610763~exp=1743614363~hmac=3b7bf99662011bbf253d6e9590d87bdefc1e79e8d89963d7478bca7ace56722c&w=996",
      "description": "Indian-style chicken curry with a rich, spicy sauce.",
      "preparation_time": "50 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in a pot.",
        "Add chicken and brown on all sides.",
        "Mix in curry spices and tomatoes.",
        "Simmer with coconut milk or broth until chicken is tender.",
        "Serve with rice or naan."
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 5,
      "name": "Caesar Salad",
      "author": "Chef Laura",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/ensalada-cesar-vista-superior-plato-ovalado-mantel-cuadros-blanco-verde-sobre-fondo-rojo-oscuro_140725-124913.jpg?t=st=1743610788~exp=1743614388~hmac=0c304b091865f6f5476a0ca938586b062ec7bab2502e22441bc66c6d55e0d358&w=740",
      "description": "Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.",
      "preparation_time": "15 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Chop the romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.",
        "Prepare Caesar dressing with anchovies, garlic, and lemon juice.",
        "Toss lettuce with dressing and croutons.",
        "Top with parmesan cheese.",
        "Serve immediately."
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 6,
      "name": "Beef Stroganoff",
      "author": "Chef Ivan",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/delicioso-goulash-listo-cenar_23-2149370899.jpg?t=st=1743610828~exp=1743614428~hmac=45bba7b9499d5cdb82b1c09ec97212bd4158b506de0af6df61c0f7ca4b34782d&w=740",
      "description": "Russian-style beef dish with a creamy mushroom sauce.",
      "preparation_time": "40 minutes",
       "steps": [
        "Sauté onions and mushrooms in a pan.",
        "Add beef strips and cook until browned.",
        "Stir in sour cream and mustard.",
        "Simmer until sauce thickens.",
        "Serve over pasta or rice."
      ]
      
    },
    {
      "id": 7,
      "name": "Paella",
      "author": "Chef Antonio",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/fotos-premium/paella-mariscos-tradicional-espanola-mesa-madera_123827-18399.jpg?w=740",
      "description": "Traditional Spanish rice dish with seafood, chicken, and saffron.",
      "preparation_time": "60 minutes",
     "steps": [
        "Sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers in a paella pan.",
        "Add chicken and seafood, cooking until browned.",
        "Stir in rice, saffron, and broth.",
        "Simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.",
        "Serve with lemon wedges."
    },
    {
      "id": 8,
      "name": "Greek Moussaka",
      "author": "Chef Nikos",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/berenjena-cruda-preparada-mozzarella-tomate_2829-19721.jpg?t=st=1743610887~exp=1743614487~hmac=dfe9664261eaf1445ae5d41d5a33a8dd1ad1cf445c73744b3e15edfd21e9f76a&w=900",
      "description": "Layered Greek casserole with eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce.",
      "preparation_time": "70 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Slice and roast the eggplant.",
        "Cook minced meat with tomatoes and spices.",
        "Prepare a béchamel sauce with butter, flour, and milk.",
        "Layer eggplant, meat, and sauce in a baking dish.",
        "Bake until golden and bubbly."
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": 9,
      "name": "Chocolate Brownies",
      "author": "Chef Emma",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/foto-gratis/vista-frontal-delicioso-pastel-chocolate-almendras_23-2148549975.jpg?t=st=1743611060~exp=1743614660~hmac=527baede31cdedb2e347973dbb6d9c07352e140d23cd6fbc89d080123a0f560d&w=740",
      "description": "Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies with a crispy top.",
      "preparation_time": "30 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Melt butter and mix with sugar and cocoa powder.",
        "Add eggs and vanilla extract.",
        "Stir in flour and mix until smooth.",
        "Pour batter into a baking pan.",
        "Bake until a toothpick comes out with moist crumbs."
      
    },
    {
      "id": 10,
      "name": "French Onion Soup",
      "author": "Chef Pierre",
      "image_link": "https://img.freepik.com/fotos-premium/sopa-cebolla-francesa-cuenco-ceramica-azul_709238-1153.jpg?w=996",
      "description": "Classic French soup with caramelized onions and melted cheese on top.",
      "preparation_time": "50 minutes",
      "steps": [
        "Caramelize onions in butter over low heat.",
        "Add beef broth and let simmer.",
        "Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls.",
        "Top with bread and grated cheese.",
        "Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly."
      ]
    }
  ]
}

headers.value: Content-Type, Origin, Accept, Authorization, Content-Length, X-Requested-With
